page.title: 03SANDWICK JUNIOR HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: The school has been in existence since 1873 but the present building was opened in October 1984. It is quite large and has many classrooms,a games hall, a computer room, a dining area, a social area and outside a multi court and playing fields. The primary block has a room where the playgroup meets four mornings every week. Mrs Ash teaches primary classes 1&2.Mrs Smith teaches classes 3&4 and Mrs Irvine teaches classes 5,6&7.There are 62 pupils in the primary department. Mr G.B.Irvine is the headteacher and Mrs M.Flaws deputy headteacher. They both teach in the secondary department which has 135 pupils and 12 teachers. 10 people visit the school to teach subjects like music,knitting andtyping.
